snippet: A new agency, Sparks and Honey, seeks to identify trends in pop culture and create content for brands that take advantage of those trends.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; Sparks and Honey, new Omnicom supported advertising agency, seeks to identify trends in pop culture and create content for brands that take advantage of those trends.
lead_paragraph: A new agency, Sparks and Honey, seeks to identify trends in pop culture and create content for brands that take advantage of those trends.

headline.seo: Spotting the Trends, Before They Break Out - Advertising
